titleStmt.title: Olde mad-cappes new gally-mawfrey Made into a merrie messe of minglemangle, out of these three idle-conceited humours following. 1 I will not. 2 Oh, the merrie time. 3 Out vpon money.
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. White] for Richard Iohnes, neere St. Andrewes Church in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Olde mad-caps new gally-mawfrey.
Some quires have vertical chain lines.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
